Title: Champions
Writer: Bob Champion (book), Jonathan Powell (book), Evan Jones (screenplay)
Actors: John Hurt, Gregory Jones, Mick Dillon, Ann Bell
Plot: The true story of Bob Champion, a British steeple chase jockey who, in the late 1970s, was diagnosed with cancer. Rather than succumb to the disease, however, Bob stages a miraculous recovery and goes on to win the 1981 Grand National steeple chase on the horse Aldaniti.
